import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Breadcrumb, BreadcrumbItem, Button, Row, Col, Label } from 'reactstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Control, Form, Errors} from 'react-redux-form'; const required = (val) => val && val.length; const maxLength = (len) => (val) => !(val) || (val.length <= len); const minLength = (len) => (val) => val && (val.length >= len); const isNumber = (val) => !isNaN(Number(val)); const validEmail = (val) => /^[A-Z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Z0-9.-]+\.[A-Z]{2,4}$/i.test(val); class Contact extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); } handleSubmit(values) { // console.log('Current State is: ' + JSON.stringify(values)); // alert('Current State is: ' + JSON.stringify(values)); this.props.postFeedback(values.firstname,values.lastname,values.telnum,values.email,values.agree,values.contacttype,values.message); // this.props.resetFeedbackForm(); // event.preventDefault(); } render(){ return(

); } } export default Contact;
